statement.p: The four sequential sides of a quadrilateral have lengths \displaystyle{a}={3.9}, \displaystyle{b}={6.3}, \displaystyle{c}={7.2}, and \displaystyle{d}={9.9} (all measured in yards). The angle between the two smallest sides is \displaystyle\alpha={105}^\circ.
What is the area of this quadrilateral?
